dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Informal news discussion, with one host being more concerned and the other more cynical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, uh, another one of these, you know, outbreaks, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, uh, another one of these, you know, outbreaks, I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, but this one, I mean, it's kids, A. Ten of them. From a preschool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, but this one, I mean, it's kids, A. Ten of them. From a preschool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 17, ten children from the "Nurai" preschool education center, located in the village of Merke, were admitted to the infectious diseases department of the Merke District Hospital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, kids get sick, B. It happens. Like, every other day, somewhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, kids get sick, B. It happens. Like, every other day, somewhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But this was mass poisoning, the report says. In Zhambyl region. And nine of them with acute intestinal, one with enterovirus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But this was mass poisoning, the report says. In Zhambyl region. And nine of them with acute intestinal, one with enterovirus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mass poisoning of children occurred in Zhambyl region. ... Nine children were diagnosed with an acute intestinal infection, while one child was found to have an enterovirus infection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, okay, so, like, food poisoning. Or, uh, just a bad bug.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, okay, so, like, food poisoning. Or, uh, just a bad bug.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: One child, though, is in intensive care. ICU, A. That's not just "a bug," is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: One child, though, is in intensive care. I C U, A. That's not just a bug, is it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One child is in the intensive care unit, but their condition is stable, with positive progress observed,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Stable condition, it says. With positive progress. So, they're fine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Stable condition, it says. With positive progress. So, they're fine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One child is in the intensive care unit, but their condition is stable, with positive progress observed,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But a working group, set up by Akim Yerbol Karashukeev himself, to thoroughly investigate each case. That's... intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But a working group, set up by Akim Yerbol Karashukeev himself, to thoroughly investigate each case. That's... intense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By order of Zhambyl Region Akim Yerbol Karashukeev, a working group has been formed to thoroughly investigate each case.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Probably just, um, a formality. To look good for the cameras.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably just, um, a formality. To look good for the cameras.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They've suspended the center's operations, for two days. And, like, doing disinfection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've suspended the center's operations, for two days. And, like, doing disinfection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The centerâ„¢s operations have been suspended for two days, and disinfection is being carried out in the building.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Two days? That's barely anything. They'll be back open, um, next week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two days? That's barely anything. They'll be back open, um, next week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Based on the inspection results, the competent authority will make an appropriate decision.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The hospital's ready to set up additional beds, if needed. And they have enough medications.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The hospital's ready to set up additional beds, if needed. And they have enough medications.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If necessary, the hospital is ready to set up additional beds for hospitalization. There is a sufficient supply of medications.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Because, you know, hospitals always say that. It's, like, their job.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Because, you know, hospitals always say that. It's, like, their job.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But samples have been taken. Experts are waiting on the test results from the Sanitary and Epidemiological Control Department.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But samples have been taken. Experts are waiting on the test results from the Sanitary and Epidemiological Control Department.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of today, the Merke District Sanitary and Epidemiological Control Department is conducting an inspection, with all samples taken, and experts are awaiting the test results,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then, I guess, they'll say, "situation stable, under control," like they always do.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, I guess, they'll say, situation stable, under control, like they always do.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As of now, the situation is stable and remains under control," the akimat's statement concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's about figuring out why this happened to these kids, don't you think? Like, uh, it matters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's about figuring out why this happened to these kids, don't you think? Like, uh, it matters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Someone has to answer for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Someone has to answer for it.
